Allow or forbid the [[player]] to place and break [[blocks]] in [[Survival]] mode.

== Syntax ==

: <code>immutableworld [value: Boolean]</code>

== Arguments ==

{{argument|be=1|value: Boolean|enum}}
: Specifies the value to set the world to be able altered.
: Must in between <code>true</code> or <code>false</code>.

== Result ==

Fails if the argument is not specified correctly.

On success, if <code>true</code> the world cannot be altered, but doors, levers, etc. can still be used, and vice versa if set to <code>false</code>. (This only applies to non-operator player). If {{cd|value: Boolean}} is not specified, displays current value.
